00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *      File:   mi_impact.c
00050  *      Author: Scott A. Mahlke, Wen-mei Hwu
00051  *      Creation Date:  September 1993
00052  *  
00053  * Revised by IMPACT Technologies Inc. (John Gyllenhaal) to support 
00054  * the 'Lcode' model for the 'IMPACT' architecture. -2/99
00055 \*****************************************************************************/
00056 
00057 /*****************************************************************************\
00058  * NOTICE OF CONVENTION                                                      *
00059  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
00060  * Mspec links to Pcode, Hcode, and Lcode modules.  In order to allow this   *
00061  * to take place without requiring front-end modules to link to liblcode.a,  *
00062  * Mspec code is divided into two classes as follows:                        *
00063  *  - mi_*.c must not depend on linkage to liblcode.a                        *
00064  *  - ml_*.c may depend on linkage to liblcode.a                             *
00065 \*****************************************************************************/
00066 
00067 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00068 #include <config.h>
00069 #include <Lcode/l_main.h>
00070 #include <machine/m_spec.h>
00071 #include <machine/m_impact.h>
00072 #include <machine/m_hppa.h>
00073 #include <machine/m_sparc.h>
00074 /*
00075  *      The way this is set up now is the following:
00076  *      If my target is ver1 of impact, i use the functions
00077  *      defined in here, otherwise I call the functions defined
00078  *      in M_hppa.c since I am using HP macros, HP calling convention,
00079  *      HP data layout, HP stack layout, etc.
00080  *
00081  */
00082 
00083 /* model compiling for, internal to this Mspec only */
00084 int M_impact_model;
00085 
00086 /* New portable model IMPACT/Lcode, which is based on HPPA/PA-7200 due
00087  * to our familiarity with it (and so our old hppa-specific tools will work)
00088  * -ITI (JCG) 2/99
00089  */
00090 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_VOID        0
00091 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT         1
00092 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_CHAR        8
00093 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_SHORT       16
00094 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT         32
00095 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_LONG        32
00096 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_FLOAT       32
00097 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_DOUBLE      64
00098 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_POINTER     32
00099 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_UNION       -1
00100 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_STRUCT      -1
00101 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BLOCK       -1
00102 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_MAX         64
00103 
00104 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_VOID       -1
00105 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BIT        1
00106 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR       8
00107 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_SHORT      16
00108 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT        32
00109 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_LONG       32
00110 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_FLOAT      32
00111 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_DOUBLE     64
00112 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_POINTER    32
00113 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_UNION      -1      /* depends on the field */
00114 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_STRUCT     -1
00115 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BLOCK      -1
00116 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX        64
00117 
00118 
00119 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_VOID      0
00120 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT       1
00121 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_CHAR      8
00122 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_SHORT     16
00123 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT       32
00124 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_LONG      32
00125 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_FLOAT     32
00126 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_DOUBLE    64
00127 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_POINTER   32
00128 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_UNION     -1
00129 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_STRUCT    -1
00130 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_BLOCK     -1
00131 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_MAX       64
00132 
00133 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_VOID     -1
00134 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT      1
00135 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_CHAR     8
00136 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_SHORT    16
00137 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT      32
00138 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_LONG     32
00139 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_FLOAT    32
00140 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_DOUBLE   64
00141 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_POINTER  32
00142 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_UNION    -1      /* depends on the field */
00143 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_STRUCT   -1
00144 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BLOCK    -1
00145 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_MAX      64
00146 
00147 int
00148 M_impact_type_size (int mtype)
00149 {
00150   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00151     {
00152       switch (mtype)
00153         {
00154         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00155           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_VOID;
00156         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00157           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT;
00158         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00159           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT;
00160         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00161           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_CHAR;
00162         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00163           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_SHORT;
00164         case M_TYPE_INT:
00165           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT;
00166         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00167           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_LONG;
00168         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00169           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_FLOAT;
00170         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00171           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_DOUBLE;
00172         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00173           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_POINTER;
00174         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00175           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_UNION;
00176         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00177           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_STRUCT;
00178         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:
00179           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BLOCK;
00180         default:
00181           return -1;
00182         }
00183     }
00184   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00185     {
00186       switch (mtype)
00187         {
00188         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00189           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_VOID;
00190         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00191           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00192         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00193           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00194         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00195           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_CHAR;
00196         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00197           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_SHORT;
00198         case M_TYPE_INT:
00199           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT;
00200         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00201           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_LONG;
00202         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00203           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_FLOAT;
00204         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00205           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_DOUBLE;
00206         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00207           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_POINTER;
00208         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00209           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_UNION;
00210         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00211           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_STRUCT;
00212         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:
00213           return M_IMPACT_SIZE_BLOCK;
00214         default:
00215           return -1;
00216         }
00217     }
00218   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00219            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00220     {
00221       return (M_hppa_type_size (mtype));
00222     }
00223   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00224            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00225     {
00226       return (M_sparc_type_size (mtype));
00227     }
00228   else
00229     {
00230       M_assert (0, "M_impact_type_size: illegal machine model");
00231       return (0);
00232     }
00233 }
00234 
00235 int
00236 M_impact_type_align (int mtype)
00237 {
00238   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00239     {
00240       switch (mtype)
00241         {
00242         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00243           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_VOID;
00244         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00245           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BIT;
00246         case M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT:
00247           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BIT;
00248         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00249           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BIT;
00250         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00251           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR;
00252         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00253           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_SHORT;
00254         case M_TYPE_INT:
00255           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT;
00256         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00257           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_LONG;
00258         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00259           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_FLOAT;
00260         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00261           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_DOUBLE;
00262         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00263           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_POINTER;
00264         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00265           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_UNION;
00266         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00267           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_STRUCT;
00268         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:
00269           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BLOCK;
00270         default:
00271           return -1;
00272         }
00273     }
00274   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00275     {
00276       switch (mtype)
00277         {
00278         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00279           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_VOID;
00280         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00281           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT;
00282         case M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT:
00283           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT;
00284         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00285           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT;
00286         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00287           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_CHAR;
00288         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00289           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_SHORT;
00290         case M_TYPE_INT:
00291           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
00292         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00293           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_LONG;
00294         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00295           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_FLOAT;
00296         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00297           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_DOUBLE;
00298         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00299           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_POINTER;
00300         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00301           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_UNION;
00302         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00303           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_STRUCT;
00304         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:
00305           return M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BLOCK;
00306         default:
00307           return -1;
00308         }
00309     }
00310   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00311            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00312     {
00313       return (M_hppa_type_align (mtype));
00314     }
00315   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00316            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00317     {
00318       return (M_sparc_type_align (mtype));
00319     }
00320   else
00321     {
00322       M_assert (0, "M_impact_type_align: illegal machine model");
00323       return (0);
00324     }
00325 }

00327 
00328 void
00329 M_impact_char (M_Type type, int unsign)
00330 {
00331   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00332     {
00333       type->type = M_TYPE_CHAR;
00334       type->unsign = (unsign != 0);
00335       type->align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR;
00336       type->size = M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_CHAR;
00337       type->nbits = M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_CHAR;
00338     }
00339   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00340     {
00341       type->type = M_TYPE_CHAR;
00342       type->unsign = (unsign != 0);
00343       type->align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_CHAR;
00344       type->size = M_IMPACT_SIZE_CHAR;
00345       type->nbits = M_IMPACT_SIZE_CHAR;
00346     }
00347   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00348            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00349     {
00350       M_hppa_char (type, unsign);
00351     }
00352   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00353            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00354     {
00355       M_sparc_char (type, unsign);
00356     }
00357   else
00358     {
00359       M_assert (0, "M_impact_char: illegal machine model");
00360     }
00361 }
00362

00467 
00468 int
00469 M_impact_layout_order (void)
00470 {
00471   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00472     {
00473       /* Use host info database to determine if little or big endian.
00474        * -ITI(JCG) 6/99
00475        */
00476       if (M_read_database_i ("_HT__info", "little_endian", "value") == 1)
00477         {
00478           return M_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
00479         }
00480       else
00481         {
00482           return M_BIG_ENDIAN;
00483         }
00484     }
00485   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00486     {
00487       return M_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
00488     }
00489   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00490            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00491     {
00492       return (M_hppa_layout_order ());
00493     }
00494   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00495            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00496     {
00497       return (M_sparc_layout_order ());
00498     }
00499   else
00500     {
00501       M_assert (0, "M_impact_layout_order: illegal machine model");
00502       return (0);
00503     }
00504 }
00505 
00506 void
00507 M_set_model_impact (char *model_name)
00508 {
00509   /* The 'lcode' model is the only model supported in the public
00510    * release.  The rest are being phased out. -JCG 2/99
00511    */
00512   if (!strcasecmp (model_name, "lcode"))
00513     {
00514       M_impact_model = M_IM_LCODE;
00515       M_model = M_IM_LCODE;
00516 
00517       /* Use the layout database to answer as many queries as possible */
00518       M_use_layout_database = 1;
00519     }
00520   else if (!strcasecmp (model_name, "V1.0"))
00521     {
00522       M_impact_model = M_IM_VER_1;
00523       M_model = M_IM_VER_1;
00524     }
00525   else if ((!strcasecmp (model_name, "HP-LCODE")) ||
00526            (!strcasecmp (model_name, "HP_LCODE")))
00527     {
00528       M_impact_model = M_IM_HP_LCODE;
00529       M_set_model_hppa ("PA_7100");
00530     }
00531   else if ((!strcasecmp (model_name, "HP-MCODE")) ||
00532            (!strcasecmp (model_name, "HP_MCODE")))
00533     {
00534       M_impact_model = M_IM_HP_MCODE;
00535       M_set_model_hppa ("PA_7100");
00536     }
00537 #ifndef IMPACT_EXTERNAL
00538   else if ((!strcasecmp (model_name, "SPARC-LCODE")) ||
00539            (!strcasecmp (model_name, "SPARC_LCODE")))
00540     {
00541       M_impact_model = M_IM_SPARC_LCODE;
00542       /* REH 1/18/95 - If you change this model to something */
00543       /* else you need to alter the model checked by         */
00544       /* O_register_allocation in limpact_phase2_reg.c       */
00545       M_set_model_sparc ("VIKING");
00546     }
00547   else if ((!strcasecmp (model_name, "SPARC-MCODE")) ||
00548            (!strcasecmp (model_name, "SPARC_MCODE")))
00549     {
00550       M_impact_model = M_IM_SPARC_MCODE;
00551       /* REH 1/18/95 - If you change this model to something */
00552       /* else you need to alter the model checked by         */
00553       /* O_register_allocation in limpact_phase2_reg.c       */
00554       M_set_model_sparc ("VIKING");
00555     }
00556 #endif
00557   else
00558     {
00559       fprintf (stderr, "illegal model_name : %s\n", model_name);
00560       fprintf (stderr,
00561                "Use one of the following: V1.0, HP-LCODE, HP-MCODE\n");
00562       M_assert (0, "M_set_model_impact: illegal model name specified");
00563     }
00564 }
Generated on Sat Aug 30 17:58:39 2014 for libmspec by  1.4.7
